about_the_game:
This is the soundtrack of Sacred Stones.
It is not a simple game music, but a re-interpretation of the game with musical sensitivity, and it is a newly composed music.

These are songs that have been recorded on real music streaming sites (Apple Music, Amazon etc.) as "Sacred Stones (Original Game Soundtrack)".

16 tracks, total length of 38' 40". Provided in 320kbps MP3 file format.

Tracklist
01. Start Up (03:02)
02. Alone In The Space (03:39)
03. Cherry Blossom (02:13)
04. AID (04:00)
05. Dream Walker(1:42)
06. Emergency(2:26)
07. Grey Sky(1:55)
08. Mummy Fantasy(1:34)
09. Jazz Beat(3:03)
10. Osori Remix(2:01)
11. Doom Chi(2:24)
12. Surimix(1:55)
13. Ring Ring(2:14)
14. Loki (2:36)
15. Summer Temple(2:06)
16. End Finish(1:50)
